name: Spider Mech
description:
A short & rushed entry to MechaJam 2022

You have state-of-the-art warp tech installed on your mech
An enemy faction wields a powerful and dangerous opponent, threatening your nation
Kill the spider mech

It's a top down """rogue-like""" where you shoot enemies and dodge them shooting you

Uhhh fight thru 2 stages and a boss fight :)
